complaints.complaint_description: The iPhone 13 Pro that I received has a cracked screen. I would like a refund or a replacement phone.
I ordered an iPad Pro, but I received a MacBook Air instead. I would like a refund or the correct item shipped to me.
I ordered the Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra on August 1st, but it still hasn't shipped. I would like a refund or a faster shipping option.
I have been trying to contact customer service for a week, but I haven't been able to get through. I would like to speak to someone about a refund for a defective product.
I saw that the Sony PlayStation 5 was on sale for $500, but when I went to checkout, the price had increased to $800. I would like a refund for the difference in price.
I am not happy with the Google Pixel 6 Pro. The battery life is terrible and the camera is not as good as I expected. I would like a refund for the product.
